sourcesContent:
import { View, Text, TouchableOpacity, Image, ImageBackground, TextInput } from 'react-native'
import { RadioButton } from 'react-native-paper';

export default function AdicionarEndereco({navigation}){
    const [selectedOption, setSelectedOption] = useState('');

    const options = [
        {
          label: 'Express',
          description: 'Até 5 dias úteis',
          price: 'R$ 00,00',
        },
        {
          label: 'Normal',
          description: 'Até 15 dias úteis',
          price: 'R$ 00,00',
        },
        {
          label: 'Rápida',
          description: 'Até 10 dias úteis',
          price: 'R$ 00,00',
        },
      ];

    return(
        <View style={{width: '100%', height: '100%', backgroundColor: 'white'}}>
            <ImageBackground style={{width: 388, height: 320}} source={require('../assets/icone_mapa.svg')}>
            
            <View style={{width: '70%', height: 120, display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row-reverse', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center'}}>
                <Text style={{fontSize: 18, fontWeight: 'bold', textAlign: 'center'}}>Adicionar Endereço</Text>
                <TouchableOpacity onPress={() => navigation.navigate('Home')}> 
                    <Image style={{width: 60, height: 60}} source={require('../assets/botão voltar.svg')}></Image>
                </TouchableOpacity>
            </View>
            
            <View style={{height: 220}}></View>
            
            <View style={{width: '100%', alignItems: 'center'}}>
                <View style={{width: 328, height: 304, backgroundColor: '#FBFBFB', borderWidth: 2, borderColor: '#ECECEC', borderRadius: 4, alignItems: 'center'}}>
                    <View style={{margin: 10}}>
                        <Text style={{fontSize: 16}}>Calcule o frete e o prazo de entrega estimados para a sua região. </Text>
                        <View style={{display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row'}}>
                            <TextInput style={{paddingLeft: 8, backgroundColor: '#F4F4F4'}} placeholder='Digite seu CEP...'></TextInput>
                            <TouchableOpacity style={{backgroundColor: 'white', width: 120, height: 40, justifyContent: 'center', shadowColor: '#A1A1A1C2', shadowOffset: {width: 2, height: 2}, shadowRadius: 8, borderRadius: 4}}><Text style={{fontSize: 16, textAlign: 'center', color: '#5F5DEE', fontWeight: 'bold', }}>Calcular</Text></TouchableOpacity>
                        </View>

                        {/* <View style={{marginTop: 24 }}>
                            <View style={{backgroundColor: "#F4F4F4", display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row', gap: '32px', height: '44px', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent:'center'}}>
                                <Text style={{fontWeight: '700', color: "#5635CC"}}>
                                    Express
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{fontWeight: 'normal', color: "#000"}}>
                                    Até 5 dias úteis
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{fontWeight: '700', color: "#5F5DEE"}}>
                                    R$ 00,00
                                </Text>
                            </View>

                            <View style={{backgroundColor: "#FBFBFB", display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row', gap: '32px', height: '44px', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent:'center'}}>
                                <Text style={{fontWeight: '700', color: "#5635CC"}}>
                                    Normal
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{fontWeight: 'normal', color: "#000"}}>
                                    Até 15 dias úteis
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{fontWeight: '700', color: "#5F5DEE"}}>
                                    R$ 00,00
                                </Text>
                            </View>

                            <View style={{backgroundColor: "#F4F4F4", display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row', gap: '32px', height: '44px', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent:'center'}}>
                                <Text style={{fontWeight: '700', color: "#5635CC"}}>
                                    Rápida
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{fontWeight: 'normal', color: "#000"}}>
                                    Até 10 dias úteis
                                </Text>
                                <Text style={{fontWeight: '700', color: "#5F5DEE"}}>
                                    R$ 00,00
                                </Text>
                            </View>

                        </View> */}

            <View style={{ marginTop: 24 }}>
                {options.map((option, index) => (
                <View key={index} style={{ backgroundColor: index % 2 === 0 ? '#F4F4F4' : '#FBFBFB', flexDirection: 'row', gap: 32, height: 44, alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' }}>
                    <RadioButton
                      value={option.label}
                      status={selectedOption === option.label ? 'checked' : 'unchecked'}
                      onPress={() => setSelectedOption(option.label)}
                    />
                    <Text style={{ fontWeight: '700', color: '#5635CC' }}>{option.label}</Text>

                    <Text style={{ fontWeight: 'normal', color: '#000' }}>{option.description}</Text>

                    <Text style={{ fontWeight: '700', color: '#5F5DEE' }}>{option.price}</Text>
                </View>))}
            </View>
        </View>
    </View>
</View>        
            <View style={{width: '100%', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-evenly', flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center'}}>
                    <TouchableOpacity style={{borderRadius: 4, backgroundColor: '#5F5DEE', width: 212, justifyContent: 'center', height: 50}}>
                        <Text style={{fontSize: 16, color: 'white', textAlign: 'center', fontWeight: 'bold'}}>Pagamento</Text>
                    </TouchableOpacity>
            </View>
            </ImageBackground>
           
            
        </View>
    )
}
